about_initialization.title: About Initialization
about_initialization.description_2: Visit i18next documentation to learn more

interpolation.title: Interpolation
interpolation.description: You can use interpolation to insert dynamic values into strings.

plurals.title: Plurals
plurals.description: There are "special" key suffixes that can be used to handle plurals. In English these are "_zero", "_one" and "_other".
